name: Iso8601_duration
documentation:
Represents an ISO 8601 duration, which may have multiple parts from years down to seconds. The `_value_` attribute is a String in the format:

* `P[nnY][nnM][nnW][nnD][T[nnH][nnM][nnS]]`

NOTE: two deviations from ISO 8601 are supported, the first, to allow a negative sign, and the second allowing the 'W' designator to be mixed with other designators.

years.name: years
years.documentation: Number of years in the `_value_`, i.e. the number preceding the `'Y'` in the `'YMD'` part, if one exists.

months.name: months
months.documentation: Number of months in the `_value_`, i.e. the value preceding the `'M'` in the `'YMD'` part, if one exists.

days.name: days
days.documentation: Number of days in the `_value_`, i.e. the number preceding the `'D'` in the `'YMD'` part, if one exists.

hours.name: hours
hours.documentation: Number of hours in the `_value_`, i.e. the number preceding the `'H'` in the `'HMS'` part, if one exists.

minutes.name: minutes
minutes.documentation: Number of minutes in the `_value_`, i.e. the number preceding the `'M'` in the `'HMS'` part, if one exists.

seconds.name: seconds
seconds.documentation: Number of seconds in the `_value_`, i.e. the integer number preceding the `'S'` in the `'HMS'` part, if one exists.

fractional_seconds.name: fractional_seconds
fractional_seconds.documentation: Fractional seconds in the `_value_`, i.e. the decimal part of the number preceding the `'S'` in the `'HMS'` part, if one exists.

weeks.name: weeks
weeks.documentation: Number of weeks in the `_value_`, i.e. the value preceding the `W`, if one exists.

is_decimal_sign_comma.name: is_decimal_sign_comma
is_decimal_sign_comma.documentation: True if this time has a decimal part indicated by ',' (comma) rather than '.' (period).

to_seconds.name: to_seconds
to_seconds.documentation: Total number of seconds equivalent (including fractional) of entire duration. Where non-definite elements such as year and month (i.e. 'Y' and 'M') are included, the corresponding 'average' durations from `Time_definitions` are used to compute the result.

add.name: add
add.documentation: Arithmetic addition of a duration to a duration, via conversion to seconds, using `Time_definitions._Average_days_in_year_` and `Time_definitions._Average_days_in_month_`

subtract.name: subtract
subtract.documentation: Arithmetic subtraction of a duration from a duration, via conversion to seconds, using `Time_definitions._Average_days_in_year_` and `Time_definitions._Average_days_in_month_`

multiply.name: multiply
multiply.documentation: Arithmetic multiplication a duration by a number.

divide.name: divide
divide.documentation: Arithmetic division of a duration by a number.

negative.name: negative
negative.documentation: Generate negative of current duration value.
